infoPopup.title: Understanding User Permissions
infoPopup.description: This video explains how to view, manage, and assign permissions to different profiles and users within the system.

permissionsSectionHeader.title: Manage Admins and Managers Permissions
permissionsSectionHeader.description: Select the permissions you want to add or remove for all Admins and Managers.

notYourPermissions: Permissions you don't have access to
